00021 template <class Base>
00022 class TSimComponentWrap:
00023                      public TComponentWrap<Base>,
00024                      public CSimComponentContextBase,
00025                      virtual public ICompositeComponent
00026 {
00027 public:
00028        typedef TComponentWrap<Base> BaseClass;
00029        typedef CSimComponentContextBase BaseClass2;
00030 
00031        TSimComponentWrap();
00032 
00036        void InitComponent();
00037 
00038        // reimplemented (icomp::IComponentContext)
00039        virtual const QByteArray& GetContextId() const;
00040 
00041        // reimplemented (icomp::ICompositeComponent)
00042        virtual IComponent* GetSubcomponent(const QByteArray& componentId) const;
00043        virtual const IComponentContext* GetSubcomponentContext(const QByteArray& componentId) const;
00044        virtual IComponent* CreateSubcomponent(const QByteArray& componentId) const;
00045        virtual void OnSubcomponentDeleted(const IComponent* subcomponentPtr);
00046 
00047        // reimplemented (icomp::IComponent)
00048        virtual const ICompositeComponent* GetParentComponent(bool ownerOnly = false) const;
00049 };

00054 template <class Base>
00055 TSimComponentWrap<Base>::TSimComponentWrap()
00056 :      BaseClass(),
00057        BaseClass2(&BaseClass::GetComponentStaticInfo())
00058 {
00059 }

00062 template <class Base>
00063 void TSimComponentWrap<Base>::InitComponent()
00064 {
00065        SetComponentContext(this, NULL, false);
00066 }

00071 template <class Base>
00072 const QByteArray& TSimComponentWrap<Base>::GetContextId() const
00073 {
00074        static QByteArray id = istd::CClassInfo::GetName<Base>();
00075 
00076        return id;
00077 }

00080 // reimplemented (icomp::ICompositeComponent)
00081 
00082 template <class Base>
00083 IComponent* TSimComponentWrap<Base>::GetSubcomponent(const QByteArray& componentId) const
00084 {
00085        BaseClass2::ComponentsMap::ConstIterator iter = BaseClass2::m_componentsMap.constFind(componentId);
00086 
00087        if (iter != BaseClass2::m_componentsMap.constEnd()){
00088               return iter.value();
00089        }
00090 
00091        return NULL;
00092 }
00093 
00094 
00095 template <class Base>
00096 const IComponentContext* TSimComponentWrap<Base>::GetSubcomponentContext(const QByteArray& /*componentId*/) const
00097 {
00098        return NULL;
00099 }
00100 
00101 
00102 template <class Base>
00103 IComponent* TSimComponentWrap<Base>::CreateSubcomponent(const QByteArray& componentId) const
00104 {
00105        FactoriesMap::ConstIterator iter = m_factoriesMap.constFind(componentId);
00106        if (iter != m_factoriesMap.constEnd()){
00107               I_ASSERT(iter.value() != NULL);
00108 
00109               return iter.value()->CreateInstance();
00110        }
00111 
00112        return NULL;
00113 }
00114

00116 template <class Base>
00117 void TSimComponentWrap<Base>::OnSubcomponentDeleted(const IComponent* /*subcomponentPtr*/)
00118 {
00119        qFatal("Simulated component cannot have sub-components");
00120 }

00125 template <class Base>
00126 const ICompositeComponent* TSimComponentWrap<Base>::GetParentComponent(bool ownerOnly) const
00127 {
00128        if (ownerOnly){
00129               return NULL;
00130        }
00131        else{
00132               return const_cast<TSimComponentWrap<Base>* >(this);
00133        }
00134 }
